name: hail2u.net
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://hail2u.net/)

scripts.postarticle: npm run feed && npm run html -- --latest && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.postbook: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.css: node bin/css.js && node bin/style-guide.js && cp --recursive assets/css/. dist/css/
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.posthtml: mv dist/mysubscriptions.html dist/mysubscriptions.opml && mv dist/sitemap.html dist/sitemap.xml
scripts.img: node bin/img.js && cp --recursive assets/img/. dist/img/ && cp assets/img/icon.svg dist/favicon.svg
scripts.postlink: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.poststatus: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.postsubscription: npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.version: npm run feed && node bin/feed-validator.js && npm run html -- --all && node bin/html-validator.js && npm run css && npm run img && npm run js && npm run static
